channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 28th March
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure please lift and replace x1 rocking dropped radius kerb 900x150x20mm stats required. (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 28th March
item.description:
28 day with give and take plus temporary footway closure please lift and relay x1 rocking dropped kerb 900x150x20mm stats required. (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Iâ€™ve reported this issue with an unacceptable response., 28th March
item.description:
I have put the Gloucestershire highways on notice about this and been told nothing will be done. Should my car obtain damage from this collection of potholes this is clear evidence of negligence on the Gloucester highways and I will be seeking full compensation for repair to my car. There neglect has already damanged my car with another pothole that they managed to get out of paying but I now how this proof.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chargrove Lane, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
